./bp_be/src/v/bp_be_mem/bp_be_dcache/bp_be_dcache_wbuf_queue.v Cov: 100% 

   1: /**
   2:  *  Name:
   3:  *    bp_be_dcache_wbuf_queue.v
   4:  *
   5:  *  Description:
   6:  *    Data cache write buffer queue.
   7:  */
   8: 
   9: module bp_be_dcache_wbuf_queue
  10:   #(parameter width_p="inv")
  11:   (
  12:     input clk_i
  13:     , input [width_p-1:0] data_i
  14:     , input el0_en_i
  15:     , input el1_en_i
  16:     , input mux0_sel_i
  17:     , input mux1_sel_i
  18:     , output logic [width_p-1:0] el0_snoop_o
  19:     , output logic [width_p-1:0] el1_snoop_o
  20:     , output logic [width_p-1:0] data_o
  21:   );
  22: 
  23:   logic [width_p-1:0] el0_r, el1_r;
  24: 
  25:   always_ff @ (posedge clk_i) begin
  26:     if (el0_en_i) begin
  27:       el0_r <= data_i;
  28:     end
  29: 
  30:     if (el1_en_i) begin
  31:       el1_r <= mux0_sel_i ? el0_r : data_i;
  32:     end
  33:   end
  34: 
  35:   assign data_o = mux1_sel_i ? el1_r : data_i;
  36:   assign el0_snoop_o = el0_r;
  37:   assign el1_snoop_o = el1_r;
  38: 
  39: endmodule
  40:
